org.ardenus.graphics.image

Class Animation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ardenus.graphics.image.Animation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Deletable, Drawable

    public class Animation
extends java.lang.Object
implements Drawable, Deletable
    Used to load animations easily using OpenGL.
    Author:
    Trent "Whirvis" Summerlin

    • Method Detail

      • getImages

        private static Image[] getImages(Resource resource)
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Loads an animation file and converts it to a list of sequenced frames.
        Parameters:
        resource - the resource to load.
        Returns:
        the loaded frames.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - thrown if an error occurs while reading the resource.

      • isLooping

        public boolean isLooping()
        Returns:
        true if the animation is looping, false otherwise.

      • setLooping

        public void setLooping(boolean looping)
        Sets the animation to whether or not it should loop.
        Parameters:
        looping - true if the animation should loop, false otherwise.

      • isPingPong

        public boolean isPingPong()
        Returns:
        true if the animation has ping pong enabled. Keep in mind that if ping pong is enabled the animation will still only play once with the ping pong unless looping is also enabled.

      • setPingPong

        public void setPingPong(boolean pingPong)
        Sets the animation to whether or not it should ping pong.
        Parameters:
        pingPong - true if ping pong should be enabled, false otherwise.

      • setLoopingPingPong

        public void setLoopingPingPong(boolean looping,
                               boolean pingPong)
        Sets the animation to whether or not it should loop and to whether or not it should ping pong.
        Parameters:
        looping - true if the animation should loop, false otherwise.
        pingPong - true if ping pong should be enabled, false otherwise.

      • getFrame

        public Image getFrame(int frame)
        Parameters:
        frame - the frame index.
        Returns:
        the image at the frame index.

      • getFrameCount

        public int getFrameCount()
        Returns:
        the amount of frames in the animation.

      • getCurrentFrame

        public Image getCurrentFrame()
        Returns:
        the current image of the frame.

      • getCurrentFrameIndex

        public int getCurrentFrameIndex()
        Returns:
        the current frame index.

      • setCurrentFrameIndex

        public void setCurrentFrameIndex(int frame)
        Sets the current frame index of the animation.
        Parameters:
        frame - the frame index to skip to.

      • nextFrame

        public void nextFrame()
        Goes to the next frame in the animation.

      • getFrameDuration

        public long getFrameDuration(int frame)
        Parameters:
        frame - the frame index.
        Returns:
        how long in milliseconds the frame will be on screen before the animation switches to the next frame.

      • setFrameDuration

        public void setFrameDuration(int frame,
                             long duration)
        Sets the frame duration.
        Parameters:
        frame - the frame index.
        duration - how long in milliseconds the frame should be on screen before the animation switches to the next frame.

      • update

        public void update(long delta)
        Updates the animation.
        Parameters:
        delta - the delta.
